verbs.description: [ARG0: President Donald Trump] [V: met] [ARG1: with Canadian Prime Minister Justin Trudeau] [ARGM-LOC: at the G7 summit] [ARGM-TMP: over the weekend] . He later called Trudeau " very dishonest & weak " and refused to sign a joint statement . On Tuesday , Trump was friendly with North Korean leader Kim Jong Un , calling talks " top of the line . "
